apis.description:
A paginated list of the users that the given user is observing.

*Note:* all users are allowed to list their own observees. Administrators can list
other users' observees.

operations.notes:
A paginated list of the users that the given user is observing.

*Note:* all users are allowed to list their own observees. Administrators can list
other users' observees.

apis.description:
Register the given user to observe another user, given the observee's credentials.

*Note:* all users are allowed to add their own observees, given the observee's
credentials or access token are provided. Administrators can add observees given credentials, access token or
the {api:UserObserveesController#update observee's id}.

operations.notes:
Register the given user to observe another user, given the observee's credentials.

*Note:* all users are allowed to add their own observees, given the observee's
credentials or access token are provided. Administrators can add observees given credentials, access token or
the {api:UserObserveesController#update observee's id}.

parameters.name: observee[unique_id]
parameters.description: The login id for the user to observe.  Required if access_token is omitted.

parameters.name: observee[password]
parameters.description: The password for the user to observe. Required if access_token is omitted.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The access token for the user to observe.  Required if <tt>observee[unique_id]</tt> or <tt>observee[password]</tt> are omitted.

apis.description:
Gets information about an observed user.

*Note:* all users are allowed to view their own observees.

operations.notes:
Gets information about an observed user.

*Note:* all users are allowed to view their own observees.

apis.description: Registers a user as being observed by the given user.

operations.notes: Registers a user as being observed by the given user.

apis.description: Unregisters a user as being observed by the given user.

operations.notes: Unregisters a user as being observed by the given user.
